item.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 21.1°C
item.description:
Observed at: Montréal-Trudeau Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EDT Sunday 25 September 2011

Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 74 %

Dewpoint: 16.3°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:
